name: NeoEarth
description:
WARNING: This game contains topics that may be sensitive to some people.

NeoEarth takes place in the future. Where humanity created an artifisial planet since living on Earth was impossible. They called this new planet "NeoEarth". However, only those who could pay were allowed in the new planet and the planet was placed at the other side of Earth´s orbit to avoid any type of illegal inmigration.

The story follows Luis, a young man that was abandoned in the sewers and was adopted by NeoEarth inmigrants. What he does and says affects the story. So think about the future before doing anything.

The story will continue even if you die.

Have Fun.
